origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAPI.analyze_patent_distribution', 'description': 'This function analyzes the patent distribution of a specified company and its competitors in a specific technology area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The technology area, e.g., artificial intelligence, biotechnology.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of competitor companies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of the patent distribution.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CompetitorAPI.analyze_patent_distribution, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'字节跳动', 'technology'是'人工智能算法', 'competitors'是['腾讯', '阿里巴巴'].
